summary: Contoso Wireless streaming service provides high-quality streaming of music, movies, TV shows, and more with no data cap or overage charges. They offer exclusive access to live events and other content. First-time customers can take advantage of discounts such as a monthly subscription plan for $9.99/month or special deals on streaming devices. There is also a Family Plan that allows up to six members of the same household to enjoy the service at a discounted rate of $14.99/month. Payment options include major credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, Apple Pay, and cash payments at select locations. The service can be used on up to four different devices simultaneously and customer support is available via email or chat.
